text: Rajvinder Kaur Gill (1971 â€“ August 31, 2012) was a Canadian banker who disappeared in late August 2012, while on a trip to Pakistan. According to the Pakistani newspaper The Nation, Gill possessed over $5 million USD at the time of her disappearance. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Canadian bankers Category:Canadian murder victims Category:People from Punjab, India Category:Punjabi people
title: Rajvinder Kaur Gill
